item.title: DrupalCamp 2016
item.description: Next edition of DrupalCamp conference will be held on 21-22.05.2016 in Wrocław. Soon we will launch new version of website and publish more information about conference.

item.title: Only 3 weeks to Drupal Camp
item.description:
Drupal Camp Wroclaw will take place in about 3 weeks. We already know the plan for this year's conference.
This year, we start on Friday at 10am with a Code Sprint when we will try to help to develop Drupal 8, Allegro module and a FoodCoop system. The Code Sprints will be led by Jarek Sobiecki, Rafał Enden and Karol Bryksa. Meanwhile in the next room, Karol Węcławski and Jarosław Bartman will hold a workshop on developing Drupal 7 templates. Due to a

item.title: Hotel for attendees.
item.description: Orbis Wrocław Hotel prepared special discounts for the attendees of the conference. You will pay only 209 PLN for a single and 240 PLN for a double room. At the reservation, please use a password: Politechnika Wrocławska. Reservations should be made via email to H3397-RE@accor.com. The rooms for the attendees of the conference reserved by the Hotel will be available to 15.05.2015 Reserve your time and meet with us in Wrocław, 29-31 May :)

item.title: Our first sponsor!
item.description: We have our first sponsor of DrupalCamp Wroclaw 2015! Droptica has become a diamond sponsor. See our sponsorship offer and support the conference.

item.title: Books for attendees founded by Helion publishing house
item.description: Interested in getting one of the books about Drupal? Helion publishing house founded 5 books, which you can win in one of the drawings during DrupalCamp Wrocław 2015! Join us for another edition of the conference on May 29-31, 2015!

item.title: DRUPALCAMP WROCŁAW 2015 IS COMING!
item.description: We started preparations for the next edition of DrupalCamp Wroclaw conference. This time the conference will take three days. Important dates 17.02.2015 - 30.04.2015 Call for papers. 1.05.2015 - 15.05.2015 Voting for sessions. 29.05.2014 - 31.05.2015 DrupalCamp Wroclaw

item.title: DrupalCamp Wrocław 2015 - let's get it started
item.description: We're starting preparations for DrupalCamp 2015. If you're interested in joining us and helping with the organization of the conference, visit https://github.com/DrupalCampWroclaw/organizacyjne_2015/issues/1 and leave your comment.
